reference.shortdesc: An overline is a horizontal line that is printed above a line of text, a mathematical symbol, or an illustration in a newspaper or journal.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the overline element is typically rendered with a line above it.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The overline element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows an overline element used to provide the highlighting used for mathematical notation:
